summary: This is an email exchange between attorneys regarding proposed redactions to Exhibit 11 of a legal filing in the Ghislaine Maxwell case, in accordance with Judge Nathan's order. The discussion involves coordination on sealing and redacting sensitive material that is also under seal in a related civil case before Judge Preska.

persons.name: Christian Everdell
persons.context: Attorney from Cohen & Gresser LLP initiating a meet and confer regarding proposed redactions to Exhibit 11 and a cover letter, as ordered by Judge Nathan.

persons.name: Judge Nathan
persons.context: Issued an order on March 18, 2021, requiring the parties to confer about redactions to Exhibit 11 and a cover letter.

persons.name: Judge Preska
persons.context: Presiding over a related civil docket where portions of a document (Exhibit H) referenced in the redactions are under seal.

connections.description: Everdell is complying with Judge Nathan's order to meet and confer regarding redactions to legal filings.

events.title: Judge Nathan's Redaction Order
events.description: Judge Nathan issued an order requiring the parties to confer about proposed redactions to Exhibit 11 and a cover letter.

events.title: Cover Letter Regarding Redactions
events.description: A cover letter was sent regarding redactions to legal filings.

events.title: Meet and Confer Email Exchange
events.description: Attorneys corresponded to schedule and discuss proposed redactions to Exhibit 11 and a cover letter, as ordered by Judge Nathan.

keyFacts: The document is an email exchange between attorneys regarding redactions to Exhibit 11 of a legal filing in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
The redactions are being made in compliance with an order from Judge Nathan dated March 18, 2021.
Specific redactions on pages 118-119 quote or reference a document (Exhibit H) that is under seal in both the criminal case and a related civil case before Judge Preska.
The attorneys are coordinating to ensure sensitive material remains protected across multiple legal proceedings.
